name: dart-polisher
description: `Dart` formatter, indents, style tweaks, based on Dart style

dart-polisher.enableFormatter.markdownDescription: Whether to enable the [dart_formatter] (https://github.com/xnfo-dart/dart-polisher) for Dart code.

dart-polisher.doNotFormat.markdownDescription: An array of glob patterns that should be excluded for formatting. The pattern is matched against the absolute path of the file. Use `**/test/**` to skip formatting for all test directories.

dart-polisher.formatterPath.description: The path to a custom Dart Formatter Server. This setting is intended for use by Dart Format Server developers.

dart-polisher.formatterSshHost.description:
An SSH host to run the Formatter Server.
This can be useful when modifying code on a remote machine using SSHFS.

dart-polisher.notifyFormatterErrors.description: Whether to show a notification the first few times an Formatter Server exception occurs.

dart-polisher.formatterAdditionalArgs.description: Additional arguments to pass to the Dart Formatter Server. This setting is intended for use by Dart Format Server developers.

dart-polisher.lineLength.description: The maximum length of a line of code. This is used by the document formatter.

dart-polisher.expressionIndent.markdownDescription: The number of spaces in a single level of expression nesting. Defaults to `#editor.tabSize#`

dart-polisher.blockIndent.markdownDescription: The number of spaces in a block or collection body. Defaults to `#editor.tabSize#`

dart-polisher.cascadeIndent.markdownDescription: How much wrapped cascade sections indent. Defaults to `#editor.tabSize#`

dart-polisher.constructorInitializerInde.markdownDescription: The ':' on a wrapped constructor initialization list. Defaults to `#editor.tabSize#`

enumDescriptions: Original Dart Style (with the ability to set custom indent sizes).
[beta] An outer braces style based on Dart Style.

dart-polisher.maxLogLineLength.description: The maximum length of a line in the log file. Lines longer than this will be truncated and suffixed with an ellipsis.

dart-polisher.extensionLogFile.description: The path to a low-traffic log file for basic extension and editor issues.

dart.formatterInstrumentationLogFile.description: The path to a log file for very detailed logging in the Dart Formatter Server that may be useful when trying to diagnose Formatter Server issues.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
